Class FlockSim

java.lang.Object
FlockSim
public class FlockSim
extends java.lang.Object
This is the FlockSim class, the point of this class is to handle all flocks and run the main logics of the simulation. Takes care of all user input Documentation Statement: I received some help from Dr. Hadfield who informed me that I needed to use a boolean to ensure that I was pausing.
Author:
C22Andrew.Lee
